snippet.title: Bright Memory Infinite GDC2020 - GamePlay
snippet.description:
Hello everyone!
  You can see the new combat system in the GamePlay,climbing was added to the level design,players need to use different skills to get over obstacles.scene we designed Chinese style architecture,NVIDIA RTX technology was used in the demonstration.Hope you like it！~
